Class ConversationResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • servlet.ConversationResource

  • @Path(value="/conversation")
public class ConversationResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Conversation related API endpoints. Options requests are all identical
    Author:
    johannes

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="/")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response corsShowConversations()
        Options request for / (All options requests are identical, therefore all following are without docstring)
        Returns:
        Response with all needed headers

      • showConversations

        @POST
 @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showConversations(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post request to get conversations
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
        {
  "session":"sessionID"
}
        Returns:
        {
  "conversationList": [
    {
      "receiverList": [
        {
          "username":"",
          "firstName":"",
          "lastName":"",
          "email":"",
          "emailhash":""
        },
      ]
      "name":"",
      "id":0
    },
  ],
  "successful":true
}

        showConversation
        

        @POST
 @Path(value="/show")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showConversation(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        

        Post request to get messages
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        jsonInput - 
        {
  "session":"sessionID",
  "conversationID":0
}
        

        Returns:
        

        {
  "messageList":[
    {
      "id":0,
      "content":"content",
      "senderDate":456456465465,
      "senderID":0
    },
  ],
  "successful":true
}

        newConversation
        

        @POST
 @Path(value="/new")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response newConversation(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        

        Post request to create new conversation
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        jsonInput - 
        {
  "session":"sessionID",
  "name":"conName", //optional
  "receiverList":[
    {
      "username":"username"
    },
  ]
}
        

        Returns:
        

        {
  "successful":true,
  "conversationID":0
}
